import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signin=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL_SIGNIN,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){console.log('Login successful!',data);navigate('/fireworks');}else{setError(data.error||'Invalid username or password.
